item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The man in black fled across the desert, and the gunslinger followed." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kevin Smith
item.description: "I'm not even supposed to be here today." -- Kevin Smith

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"I do not aim with my hand; he who aims with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I aim with my eye.
I do not shoot with my hand; he who shoots with his hand has forgotten the face of his father. I shoot with my mind.
I do not kill with my gun; he who kills with his gun has forgotten the face of his father. I kill with my heart." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When his life was ruined, his family killed, his farm destroyed, Job knelt down on the ground and yelled up to the heavens, "Why god? Why me?" and the thundering voice of God answered, There's just something about you that pisses me off." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Good books don't give up all their secrets at once." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Fiction is the truth inside the lie." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Robert Bloch
item.description: "Despite my ghoulish reputation, I really have the heart of a small boy. I keep it in a jar on my desk." -- Robert Bloch

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are the perfect entertainment: no commercials, no batteries, hours of enjoyment for each dollar spent. What I wonder is why everybody doesn't carry a book around for those inevitable dead spots in life." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Both Rowling and Meyer, they’re speaking directly to young people. … The real difference is that Jo Rowling is a terrific writer and Stephenie Meyer can’t write worth a darn. She’s not very good." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Go then, there are other worlds than these." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I think that we're all mentally ill. Those of us outside the asylums only hide it a little better - and maybe not all that much better after all." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "If our Founding Fathers wanted us to care about the rest of the world, they wouldn't have declared their independence from it." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Agnostics are just atheists without balls." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Look, PETA! If God hadn't wanted us to eat animals, he wouldn't have made them so darn <i>tasty!</i>" -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "I’m the frosting on America’s cake, and tonight I’m willing to let you lick the bowl." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "They say the only people who tell the truth are drunkards and children. Guess which one I am." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Wikipedia is the first place I go when I'm looking for knowledge... or when I want to create some." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "So if animals aren't our friends, then what are they? The answer can be summed up between two buns." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Researchers from Britain's Keele University have found that swearing after an injury may help alleviate pain. Evidently, the pain that you feel is inversely proportional to the number of middle names you give Jesus." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Ali add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Ali add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "If you love something set it free, but don't be surprised if it comes back with herpes." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Only enemies speak the truth; friends and lovers lie endlessly, caught in the web of duty." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The 3 types of terror: The Gross-out: the sight of a severed head tumbling down a flight of stairs, it's when the lights go out and something green and slimy splatters against your arm. The Horror: the unnatural, spiders the size of bears, the dead waking up and walking around, it's when the lights go out and something with claws grabs you by the arm. And the last and worse one: Terror, when you come home and notice everything you own had been taken away and replaced by an exact substitute. It's when the lights go out and you feel something behind you, you hear it, you feel its breath against your ear, but when you turn around, there's nothing there..." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "All is forgotten in the stone halls of the dead. These are the rooms of ruin where the spiders spin and the great circuits fall quiet, one by one..." -- Stephen King

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "And so it goes..." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Here is a lesson in creative writing. First rule: Do not use semicolons. They are transvestite hermaphrodites representing absolutely nothing. All they do is show you've been to college." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut Jr.
item.description: "And I urge you to please notice when you are happy, and exclaim or murmur or think at some point, 'If this isn't nice, I don't know what is." -- Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

item.title: Ali add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "One of the few good things about modern times: If you die horribly on television, you will not have died in vain. You will have entertained us." -- Kurt Vonnegut
